subject: Re: [junit] Kent Beck's Test Driven Development Book
msgSnippet: ... The Assert class in the CVS repository includes this method (so it will be available in the next release). -Vladimir -- Vladimir Bossicard
messageBody:
> JUnit 3.7 Assert class does not have that method.
> Is it a new method to be introduced in JUnit 3.8?

The Assert class in the CVS repository includes this method (so it will
be available in the next release).

-Vladimir
